EmailTemplate.subject: TriCON Agenda Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Detailed Agenda Now Available September 13 - 16 l Boston, Massachusetts
There's still time to register for TriCON. You can take a closer look at what sessions are being offered in our detailed agenda, which is now available online. Some Imc sessions you can attend include:
CAD Modules to Improve Dispatcher Productivity Using DDF Queries to Enhance the Imc Experience Troubleshooting Tips Crime Analysis Using the Fire Journal and Fire Calendar
With the Detailed Agenda and our ROI Letter, we've made it easier to receive approval to this important educational event.
www.tritech.com/tricon
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
